name: dhiraj-pandit-portfolio
description: Modern futuristic portfolio website for Dhiraj Pandit

scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend install --omit=dev && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install

postinstall: npm --prefix backend install --omit=dev && npm --prefix frontend install
author: Dhiraj Pandit
